the_opportunity.intro: The Environmental Protection Branch of the Ministry is seeking up tofive permanentandmultiple termJunior Environmental Protection Officers with a strong background inengineering or scienceto support the delivery of results-based environmental protection programs across Saskatchewan.

qualifications.education_requirements: Typically, the knowledge and abilities required for this position can be achieved through a degree in engineering or science combined with related environmental work experience or equivalent combination of education and experience.
